question.text: One end of a thermally insulated rod is kept at a temperature T 1 and the other at T 2 . The rod is composed of two sections of lengths l 1 and l 2 and thermal conductivities K 1 and K 2 respectively. The temperature at the interface of the two sections is

options.text: <math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math>

<math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math>

<math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math>

<math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">T</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> </mrow> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo>+</mo> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">K</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext mathvariant="italic">l</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </msub> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math>
